channel.title: Whonix 9.4 OVA Torrents on I2P
channel.description:
Using I2P torrents can provide a way to anonymously download Whonix ova files. This method is slow, but reasonably anonymous.
The clearnet torrent: https://www.whonix.org/download/9.4-torrent/Whonix-Gateway-9.4.ova.torrent
Is now being mirrored on I2P http://tracker2.postman.i2p/index.php?view=TorrentDetail&id=30041 magnet:?xt=urn:btih:c309849d7ce628168ebc5db15280a2367cd01c88&dn=Whonix-Gateway-9.4.ova&tr=http://tracker2.postman.i2p/announce.php
The clearnet torrent: https://www.whonix.org/download/9.4-torrent/Whonix-Workstation-9.4.ova.torrent
Is now being mirrored on I2P: http://tracker2.postman.i2p/index.php?view=TorrentDetail&id=30040 magnet:?xt=urn:btih:89fada3edb2ad55cea70e308356922844c2aeed0&dn=Whonix-Workstation-9.4.ova&tr=http://tracker2.postman.i2p/announce.php
You should always verify with GPG and signing with the keys at: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download
More info: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I2P

FREE Whonix ™ Download for Windows, macOS, Linux and Others

FREE Download Whonix ™. Privacy Protection. Anonymity Online. For Windows, macOS, Linux.

More info:

en.wikipedia.org

I2P

The Invisible Internet Project (I2P) is an anonymous network layer (implemented as a Mix Network) that allows for censorship-resistant, peer to peer communication. Anonymous connections are achieved by encrypting the user's traffic (by using end-to-end encryption), and sending it through a volunteer-run network of roughly 55,000 computers distributed around the world. Given the high number of possible paths the traffic can transit, a third party watching a full connection is unlikely. The soft...
